price: 84. En alles wat zij plachten te doen, baatte hen niet.
arabic: فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: famā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yaksibūna
